page.title: 17LEISURE - Carolyn
page.content: I like to collect dolls because they look nice on my shelf and make my bedroom pretty. My favourite dolls are the smaller ones like the lacemaker. Another has a net or a veil over her head and blue dress. I also like to read Look In, some of them are quite funny. I like writing stories and I would like to write them for young and old people when I grow up. I collect soaps that smell nice. I also collect keyrings, rubbers and my old school work. I take my dog for a walk and sometimes I go rollerskating or ride my bike with my freinds like Helen. We sometimes watch television together. My brother plays football or with his Lego and we go swimming when we can.
